speaker: President.
english: President. Thank you, Mrs Kaufmann. If I may make a brief comment, when I visited the Knesset last week I was welcomed by a band playing the European anthem. In view of everything that is going on just now, we should certainly consider whether we should not be doing that here in the European Parliament too.
original: President. Thank you, Mrs Kaufmann. If I may make a brief comment, when I visited the Knesset last week I was welcomed by a band playing the European anthem. In view of everything that is going on just now, we should certainly consider whether we should not be doing that here in the European Parliament too.
agenda_item: Roadmap for the European Union's constitutional process (debate)
